com.xorprogramming.wallpaper

Class SimpleWallpaperService.SimpleEngine<T extends WallpaperScene>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperService.Engine
      • com.xorprogramming.wallpaper.SimpleWallpaperService.SimpleEngine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of WallpaperScene
    Enclosing class:
    SimpleWallpaperService

    public class SimpleWallpaperService.SimpleEngine<T extends WallpaperScene>
extends android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperService.Engine
    Handles the rendering of a WallpaperScene and threading required to update it. The scene is only updated when the live wallpaper can be seen by a user. Note that the SimpleEngine runs entirely on the UI thread and may not be suitable for a WallpaperScene that require intensive updating or rendering.
    Version:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    WallpaperScene, SimpleWallpaperService
